scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,agent -c blue,green "pnpm -C apps/web dev" "pnpm -C apps/agent dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C apps/agent build
scripts.start: concurrently -n web,agent -c blue,green "pnpm -C apps/web start" "pnpm -C apps/agent start"
scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/web lint && pnpm -C apps/agent lint
